name: Dragon's Hoard (FlowerSnek)
description:
This Game Boy-styled shoot 'em up was created for the third Retrograde Jam.

Blurb

You're a dragon — and a band of heroes has snuck into your lair and stolen a bag of your treasure. Pursue them across the land to take back your gold! (It's a Game Boy game; what more do you need?) Collect power-ups and mix and match your weapons to annihilate everything in your path!

Controls

  • Arrow keys: Move your dragon around.
  • X: Fire all your currently-equipped weapons. On the menu screen, press this to choose weapons to swap around.
  • Z: Cancel your selection on the pause menu.
  • Enter: Pause the game. Press this to open your menu screen and rearrange weapons; use X to select two weapons to swap.
  • F4: Toggle fullscreen.
